name: Chicken Parmesan II
ingredients: 1/2 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese, 2 ounces

instructions.en: Mix parmesan cheese, parsley, basil, paprika, salt, pepper, and garlic powder in a shallow dish or pie pan.
Dip each chicken breast in melted butter, then coat with the parmesan mixture.
Place coated chicken breasts in a greased baking pan.
Bake for about 20 minutes or until chicken is done, depending on the size of the breasts.
Top each breast with 1 tablespoon of spaghetti sauce and 1 ounce of shredded mozzarella.
Return to the oven for a few minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

notes: This recipe makes 3 servings. Can be frozen.
